item.title: 4th and Goal
item.description: I am using data from the nflscrapR package to investigate offensive success on goal to go situations on different downs. Figure 1. If we define success as a play with a positive value for excepted points added (epa), we can see a nice split in good/bad distribution for 3rd and 4th down. There is a decent split for second down as well. html { font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Helvetica Neue', 'Fira Sans', 'Droid Sans', Arial, sans-serif; } #epqnuhfydz .
